hero.subtitle: Your reliable partner for premium fruits, vegetables, and fine foods – directly from the producer to you.

delivery.title: Reliable. Fresh. Straight to you.
delivery.subtitle: With our own delivery fleet, we bring fresh fruits and vegetables daily to restaurants, hotels, and large kitchens in the greater Stuttgart area.
delivery.description: Our modern vehicle fleet is ready every morning to deliver your order on time and in the best quality. Whether restaurant, canteen, or catering – we deliver reliably throughout the greater Stuttgart area and beyond.
delivery.imageAlt: Fresh for you delivery fleet – Our vehicles in action

punctual.title: On time
punctual.text: Daily delivery early in the morning – so everything arrives when you need it.

fresh.title: Guaranteed fresh
fresh.text: Cold chain from wholesale market to your kitchen – no compromises.

radius.title: Stuttgart & 40+ km
radius.text: We deliver throughout the greater Stuttgart area and surrounding regions.

fleet.title: Own fleet
fleet.text: Multiple refrigerated vehicles in operation – flexible and reliable.

about.title: Freshness is our tradition
about.text1: Since our founding, Fresh4You has stood for the highest quality and freshness. As a regional produce dealer, we combine traditional values with modern service.
about.text2: Our dedicated team ensures daily that only the best products find their way to our customers. We rely on close partnerships with regional producers and sustainable supply chains.
about.text3: Quality you can taste – that's our promise to you.

quality.title: Quality
quality.text: Only the best products make it into our assortment.

personal.title: Personal
personal.text: Individual consultation and a direct line to every customer.

2018.title: The Beginning
2018.text: With a single customer and a big vision, we launched our delivery service in 2018. Every morning, fresh fruits and vegetables straight from the Stuttgart wholesale market – reliable and in the best quality.

2019.title: Growth Through Trust
2019.text: Word of mouth was our best marketing. Within a year, we were already supplying several restaurants and canteens in the Stuttgart area.

2021.title: Our Own Fleet
2021.text: With growing demand, we invested in our own refrigerated vehicle fleet to serve even more customers reliably and with guaranteed freshness.

today.title: Today
today.text: Fresh4You serves numerous clients from restaurants, hotels, and large kitchens throughout the greater Stuttgart area and beyond – with the same commitment to quality and personal service as on day one.

products.title: Variety that inspires
products.subtitle: From crisp vegetables and aromatic herbs to exotic fruits – we leave nothing to be desired.

vegetables.title: Vegetables
vegetables.text: Fresh seasonal vegetables – from tomatoes and peppers to root vegetables and leafy greens.

fruits.title: Fruits
fruits.text: Regional and exotic fruits in the best quality – from apples to citrus fruits.

herbs.title: Herbs
herbs.text: Fresh herbs for the perfect taste – basil, rosemary, parsley and more.

sprouts.title: Sprouts & Shoots
sprouts.text: Nutrient-rich sprouts and shoots for a healthy and varied cuisine.

mushrooms.title: Mushrooms
mushrooms.text: Button mushrooms, porcini, chanterelles and other premium mushrooms in top quality.

specialties.title: Specialties
specialties.text: Dried fruits, nuts and edible flowers – special products for special dishes.

service.title: Service that convinces
service.subtitle: We are more than just a supplier – we are your partner for fresh food.

delivery.title: Reliable Delivery
delivery.text: Punctual delivery right to your door – fresh and reliable every day.

consultation.title: Personal Consultation
consultation.text: Our experienced team advises you individually on assortment and seasonal goods.

flexibility.title: Flexible Assortment
flexibility.text: Customized orders to your wishes – we adapt to your needs.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.text: Strict quality controls from producer to delivery.

sustainability.title: Responsibility for tomorrow
sustainability.text: Sustainability is not a trend for us – it's our conviction. We consistently rely on short transport routes, regional partnerships, and environmentally friendly packaging.

regional.title: Regional Partners
regional.text: Close cooperation with local producers for short distances.

packaging.title: Sustainable Packaging
packaging.text: Environmentally friendly and recyclable packaging solutions.

resources.title: Resource-efficient
resources.text: Efficient logistics and minimal ecological footprint.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or would you like to place an order? We look forward to your message.

form.name: Name
form.privacy: By submitting, you agree to our privacy policy.

responsible.heading: 1. Data Controller
responsible.text: The party responsible for data processing on this website is:

general.heading: 2. General Information
general.text1: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to us. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations (in particular the GDPR).
general.text2: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data.

collection.heading: 3. Data Collection When Visiting the Website
collection.text: When accessing this website, the following data is automatically collected by the hosting provider:

items.date: Date and time of the request

collection.purpose: This data is used exclusively for the technical provision and security of the website.
collection.legal: The legal basis is Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in a secure and stable website).

email.heading: 4. Contact via Email
email.text1: If you contact us by email, the data you provide (e.g. name, email address, content of the message) will be stored in order to process your inquiry.
email.text2: We will not share this data without your consent.
email.legal: The legal basis is Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (processing of your inquiry).

storage.heading: 5. Data Retention
storage.text: Personal data is only stored for as long as is necessary to process your inquiry or as required by statutory retention periods.

rights.heading: 6. Your Rights
rights.text: You have the right at any time to:
rights.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection supervisory authority.

ssl.heading: 7. SSL/TLS Encryption
ssl.text: For security reasons, this website uses SSL/TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by "https://" in the address bar of your browser.

footer.description: Your reliable partner for fresh fruits, vegetables, and fine foods.
